rule.note: Forward all requests ending with a slash, but NOT proceded by a url containing a period, to */index.cfm. Winstone handles welcome files using redirects, which is different from jetty which uses forwards. This replaces welcome file handling for index.cfm files and makes winstone act more like jetty.
Search Engine Friendly URLs. This replicates the behavior of the default SEO filter provided by OpenBD (com.newatlanta.filters.SearchEngineFriendlyURLFilter).
